briefdescription.para: Render only objects that far away.
Visible objects for next rendering - (re-)set in setupView.

detaileddescription.para: Valid names are: Plasma, Homing, Raybeam, Machinegun, Explosion. Throws an exception in case of an error.

memberdef.argsstring: (Entity *ex, std::set< OID > *rolemask, bool all, int maxamount, std::list< rTarget * > *objects)
memberdef.name: filterByTags

briefdescription.para: Filters the given objectlist by tags (ORed Bitmask) (excluding ex Object).

detaileddescription.para: There is the option to match all tags (true=AND) or to select any given tag (false=OR). The returned list is fresh allocated - caller delete responsibility.

memberdef.argsstring: (Entity *ex, float *origin, float minrange, float maxrange, int maxamount, std::list< rTarget * > *objects=NULL)
memberdef.name: filterByRange

briefdescription.para: Returns a List of objects which are within minimum and maximum range (excluding ex Object).

detaileddescription.para: The returned list is fresh allocated - caller delete responsibility.

briefdescription.para: Limit position to accessible areas and returns impact depth.

parameterdescription.para: The particle position to be constrained given in world coordinates.
The size of the particle in terms of a radius.

simplesect.para: Zero if there was no collision, else the maximum impact depth.

briefdescription.para: Advance simulation time for one frame.
Let all objects process input, adjust pose and calculate physics.
Let all objects calculate transformation matrices etc.
Draw all Object's solid surfaces (calls their drawSolid method).
Draw all Object's effects (calls their drawEffect method).
